sentences.sentence: Suddenly Dooku saw two Gold team members running toward the turbolift.
sentences.translation: 突然，杜库看见两名金队队员奔向涡轮电梯。

sentences.sentence: Dooku reached out and pressed the button to stop the turbolift. "We're not getting out, " he told the others. "We're going up. "
sentences.translation: 杜库伸手按下电梯停止的按钮，“我们不出去了，”他告诉其他人，“我们上去。”
